channel.title: About PVP Planet =[]
channel.description: not to sound umm... well yea I do sound kinda nooby but anyways, I've downloaded and ran PVP Planet source and, I was told you should use Bluurrs client to play it. Whenever I log in on bluurrs.. or even the official Jinrake client, I get logged out immediately. Help?

item.title: About PVP Planet =[]
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

Read bluurrs client thread, it has to do with Head Icons, there is a quick fix for it on his thread.

Read full topic
